ShortDescription.Value: Scale Public Transit, Passengers, Industry Cargo and Delivery, Road + Parks vehicles, and increase Transit Line slider limits.

Publish.LongDescription:
### Dispatch Boss
Scale **fleet sizes** and **vehicle capacities** in: all Public Transit, Industry, Cargo stations, and Parks/Roads Maintenance. New: includes Transit Line Slider vehicle increases.
### What it does
NEW **expand Transit Line in-game slider limits** (min can reduce to just (1) vehicle on most routes; maximums are all increased) - **Transit depots**: change max vehicles per depot (Bus, Tram, Train, Subway) - **Passengers**: change seats per vehicle (Bus, Tram, Train, Subway, Ship, Ferry, Airplane) -NEW **Industry Deliveries**: scale cargo capacity for delivery vehicles (Semi trucks, Delivery vans, Motorbike delivery, Raw materials trucks - coal, oil, etc.) -NEW **Extractor companies**: Fish, Grain, etc.; scale max fleet size (usually semi trucks) -NEW **Cargo Stations**: scale max fleet of cargo stations (harbor/train/airport) -NEW **Parks + Roads maintenance**: fleet size, work shift, rate (alpha) -NEW **Road wear speed** (alpha): scale how fast or slow roads accumulate wear over time
### Notes 🚍🚋🚆✈️🚢 - **Adjust Sliders** at any time, no restart needed; Supports switching cities. - New Transit lines: expanded limits still follow the game’s **route cycle time** (travel time + stops); slider gets higher maximums. It varies per line (due to game's formula). - Depot capacity = maximum number of vehicles a single depot can maintain/spawn (does not scale extension buildings). - **Avoid** other depot/passenger capacity mods to avoid conflicts (they override each other). - No Harmony or Reflection; more compatible - less likely to break with game updates. - Safe to remove any time (use Reset buttons to return to vanilla game default values).
## 11 Languages
- English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski Polish, Português Brazilian - 한국어, 日本語, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese), 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese
